version.prefix: SELECT s.name AS schema_name, t.name AS table_name, c.name AS column_name, EP1.value AS information_type_name, EP2.value AS information_type_id, EP3.value AS sensitivity_label_name, EP4.value AS sensitivity_label_id, sensitivity_rank = NULL INTO #tmp_classified_columns FROM sys.columns c LEFT JOIN sys.tables t ON t.object_id = c.object_id LEFT JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id = t.schema_id LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP1 ON c.object_id = EP1.major_id AND c.column_id = EP1.minor_id and EP1.name = 'sys_information_type_name' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP2 ON c.object_id = EP2.major_id AND c.column_id = EP2.minor_id and EP2.name = 'sys_information_type_id' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP3 ON c.object_id = EP3.major_id AND c.column_id = EP3.minor_id and EP3.name = 'sys_sensitivity_label_name' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP4 ON c.object_id = EP4.major_id AND c.column_id = EP4.minor_id and EP4.name = 'sys_sensitivity_label_id' WHERE (EP1.value IS NOT NULL OR EP2.value IS NOT NULL OR EP3.value IS NOT NULL OR EP4.value IS NOT NULL)

SELECT s.name AS schema_name, t.name AS table_name, c.name AS column_name, EP1.value AS information_type_name, EP2.value AS information_type_id, EP3.value AS sensitivity_label_name, EP4.value AS sensitivity_label_id, sensitivity_rank = NULL INTO #tmp_classified_columns FROM sys.columns c LEFT JOIN sys.tables t ON t.object_id = c.object_id LEFT JOIN sys.schemas s ON s.schema_id = t.schema_id LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP1 ON c.object_id = EP1.major_id AND c.column_id = EP1.minor_id and EP1.name = 'sys_information_type_name' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP2 ON c.object_id = EP2.major_id AND c.column_id = EP2.minor_id and EP2.name = 'sys_information_type_id' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP3 ON c.object_id = EP3.major_id AND c.column_id = EP3.minor_id and EP3.name = 'sys_sensitivity_label_name' LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties EP4 ON c.object_id = EP4.major_id AND c.column_id = EP4.minor_id and EP4.name = 'sys_sensitivity_label_id' WHERE (EP1.value IS NOT NULL OR EP2.value IS NOT NULL OR EP3.value IS NOT NULL OR EP4.value IS NOT NULL) AND t.temporal_type != 1
